1234270.name: The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters DLC - Soundtrack
1234270.description: This is the bone-chilling soundtrack to The Coma 2: Vicious Sisters, a Korean survival horror game featuring hand-illustrated graphics and a relentless psycho slasher. A collaborative effort between Hyunho Kim, Hakyung Kim, Sungwoo Hwang, SP3CK, and Navytone. They set the tone for the Shadow Realm and Mina Park's journey into darkness.
1234270.supported_languages:
英语, 韩语*, 法语, 德语, 俄语, 简体中文, 乌克兰语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙
*具有完全音频支持的语言
